data.title: Ferrari, parent Exor clinch alliance with Apple designer Jony Ive - Reuters
data.description: Italian luxury car maker Ferrari and parent company Exor, the holding vehicle of the Agnelli family, have agreed a long term partnership with Jony Ive, the designer of many of Apple's iconic products, and Marc Newson.

data.title: This Tablet Makes It Easy to Zoom With Older Loved Ones
data.description: It requires an expensive subscription, but this device is specially designed for the elderly.

data.title: Attack of the Hollywood Cliches! Charlie Brooker and Rob Lowe churn out a shoddy tropefest
data.description: It’s got a fine lineup of film stars and critics, but this tedious tour of movie tricks feels like an opportunity missed. What were they all thinking? I have long made peace with the fact that I will never figure Netflix out. Maybe that is the point: Netflix,…

data.title: How Emma Raducanu prevents one mistake from leading to another | Sean Ingle
